Text: thanks Garique best quality out at the moment, pity there no direct line audio for this. Then it would be a TS, but at the moment i would call it a cam as the audio is cam...

Not DVD quality but for a cam its very watchable

Is this the same german video source?

The audio has a slight delay thru the whole film by 0.3 seconds... In order to correct this in VLC player Click on the "tools" bar and then click on "track synchronizastion" in the audio/vido firled at the top, click the up arrow untill u reach +0.300 Seconds
Why call it a TS when it's not Direct Audio

umm in VLC players goto preferences under settings or hit (ctrl+s) then highlight audio and check the advanced settings box then find "audio desyncronization compensation" move it up to "3"..and walla!
